Summary: first notice it over cival air-port but also near A.F.B may-be around 500 feet at first
divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching TV when I notice reddish object over the air port area moving toward my apt very slowly I new what it was almost right away. I grab my camera whent out side and took photos of the object and was trying to switch to video when the object was no longer there,it just vanish one moment it was there and then gone. I reviewed photo's and to my surprise there was other objects that I was not aware of and they seen to be some type of scouting craft of some sort,& they got closer then the object that I was trying to photograph did.
